commits.author: Uwe Schindler
commits.sourceNew:
/** *

This is called each time the writer completed a commit. * This gives the policy a chance to remove old commit points * with each commit.

* *

The policy may now choose to delete old commit points * by calling method {@link IndexCommit#delete delete()} * of {@link IndexCommit}.

* *

This method is only called when {@link * IndexWriter#commit} or {@link IndexWriter#close} is * called, or possibly not at all if the {@link * IndexWriter#rollback} is called. * *

Note: the last CommitPoint is the most recent one, * i.e. the "front index state". Be careful not to delete it, * unless you know for sure what you are doing, and unless * you can afford to lose the index content while doing that. * * @param commits List of {@link IndexCommit}, * sorted by age (the 0th one is the oldest commit). */ public void onCommit(List commits) throws IOException;

commits.author: Dawid Weiss
commits.sourceNew:
/** *

This is called each time the writer completed a commit. * This gives the policy a chance to remove old commit points * with each commit.

* *

The policy may now choose to delete old commit points * by calling method {@link IndexCommit#delete delete()} * of {@link IndexCommit}.

* *

This method is only called when {@link * IndexWriter#commit} or {@link IndexWriter#close} is * called, or possibly not at all if the {@link * IndexWriter#rollback} is called. * *

Note: the last CommitPoint is the most recent one, * i.e. the "front index state". Be careful not to delete it, * unless you know for sure what you are doing, and unless * you can afford to lose the index content while doing that. * * @param commits List of {@link IndexCommit}, * sorted by age (the 0th one is the oldest commit). */ public void onCommit(List commits) throws IOException;

Note: the last CommitPoint is the most recent one, * i.e. the "front index state". Be careful not to delete it, * unless you know for sure what you are doing, and unless * you can afford to lose the index content while doing that. * * @param commits List of {@link IndexCommit}, * sorted by age (the 0th one is the oldest commit). */ public void onCommit(List commits) throws IOException;
